refSource: Player's Handbook, Heroes of the Fallen Lands, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms
fullText:
Weapon Proficiency

Benefit: You gain proficiency in a single weapon of your choice.
Special: You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose another weapon.


Update (8/5/2010)
Feat updated to match Essentials data.

Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 201, Heroes of the Fallen Lands, page(s) 319, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, page(s) 321.
name: Weapon Proficiency
special: You can take this feat more than once. Each time you select this feat, choose another weapon.
benefit: You gain proficiency in a single weapon of your choice.
